sections.content:
🍜 **How To Write A DM** 🍜 

"What is a DM?"

**Summary:**
- A message you send to prospects on social media or email
- The point is to offer your service
- Nobody knows you exist until you put yourself out there

**Action steps:**
- Understand what a DM is

•




"Don't Jump too Soon"

**Summary:**
- Outreach is how you are going to land clients but jumping in too early can make it harder than it needs to be
- Make time to prospect and send DMs daily
- The entire method has been developed into a simple process but you still need to do the work

**Action steps:**
- Make time to prospect and outreach daily

•




"Mindset to Success When Writing a DM"

**Summary:**
- You must be consistent - you learn more by applying and improving just 1% every day
- Do not give up
- Winners always find a way to win - don’t create excuses to quit

**Action steps:**
- Take notes
- Develop a consistent habit of sending DMs

•




"Why I'm Not Giving You Templates"

**Summary:**
- Everyone copies the DM almost word-for-word so you won’t stand out
- Use your brain and develop the skill of writing DMs
- The steps actually work, you just have to follow them

**Action steps:**
- Do not copy a DM template

•




"The Basics Of Sending A DM"

**Summary:**
- Be a normal human - talk to them like a friend and someone you want to help
- Don’t use AI to write your DMs, but feel free to use it to get ideas
- It’s ok to move on and not close the client, there are endless prospects
- Have the mindset that you have a valuable service but don’t be arrogant
- Show examples of your results

**Action steps:**
- Develop the abundance mindset

Where do you find the templates we have given you?

A Inside the "Flipping Sites" channel.
B Inside the "Millionaire Access Checklist channel.
C WE ARE NOT GIVING YOU TEMPLATES. -

•


🏆 **DMing Mastery** 🏆 

"Mastering Effective Outreach Strategies"

**Summary:**
- Example 1 - Specific compliment with a question that leads to your service
- Example 2 - Custom line to catch their attention, problem or social proof, benefits, CTA to a call
- Example 3 - Create a short video explaining how you found them, how you can help them, CTA to a call
- Example 4 - Offer to work for free or cheap for a testimonial, overdeliver before asking for a testimonial
- Example 5 - Mention results you’ve made for other clients and let them know what you’re up to
- Example 6 - Ask a specific question about something on their profile
- Example 7 - Create a short loom video reviewing their business

**Action steps:**
- Select a DM style and write a great DM

•




"Understanding Testimonials and Building Social Proof"

**Summary:**
- A testimonial is just your client saying something positive about you
- More social proof means clients are more likely to choose you, even if you cost more
- To get a testimonial, you just have to ask once you’ve delivered amazing results
- Share your testimonials on your social media and in your outreach
- As a freelancer, much of your business is based on your reputation

**Action steps:**
- Ask your clients for testimonials
- Share your testimonials on social media

•




"The Art of the Follow-Up"

**Summary:**
- Prospects are busy, especially if their business is doing well
- Keep track of your outreach
- If they don’t reply, follow up with a simple reply or meme 3-4 times max
- You can also find them on other platforms

**Action steps:**
- Create a spreadsheet to track your outreach
- Follow up 3-4 times

•




"Examples of What Not to Do in a DM"

**Summary:**
- Do not reach out with 0 followers
- Do not have a bad profile
- Do not have 0 posts
- Do not make the DM about you
- Do not write a long DM
- Do not give generic compliments
- Do not copy/paste DM templates

**Action steps:**
- Check your DM for these common mistakes and correct them
- Analyze the data - if you send lots of DMs but get no responses, tweak your DM

•




"How to Overcome Problems When Sending DMs"

**Summary:**
- Problems aren’t blocks to your progress
- You aren’t getting responses: test it, ask for feedback
- Your account gets disabled: only send 10 DMs per day, appeal the ban
- You sent 10+ DMs per platform but want to send more: use email or phone, build your social media
- You feel lost: follow The Simple Steps and take action on your next step

**Action steps:**
- Take action on your next step of The Simple Steps

•




"Your Action Tasks for Sending DMs"

**Action steps:**
- Understand what a DM is
- Download Grammarly
- Practice writing DMs
- Ensure you follow The Simple Steps 1-4 before worrying about DMs
- Ensure you aren’t making any of the common mistakes
- Build rapport before outreaching
- Send 10 DMs daily
- Test your DM and ask for feedback
- Earn $500 USD profit and get Millionaire Access certified

How many Effective Outreach Strategy examples did we provide you with?

A 7 -
B 5
C 6
D 4
